data.text: One credit hour of Continuing Medical Education (CME), Continuing Nursing Education (CNE), and Continuing Professional Education (CPE) will be available to participants. For questions, please contact LCecho@salud.unm.edu.
The program is open to all health care professionals and all #LongCOVID and #MECFS patient-lived experience experts interested in learning more about the treatment of Long COVID and ME/CFS.

This large-scale, national webinar series will be held on the second Thursday of every month. They will offer didactic presentations by subject matter experts, examples of emerging promising practices and models of care, and a facilitated question and answer (Q&A) period.
